title: top presents for women of all ages for 2019
text:

Buying Christmas gifts for the special lady (or ladies in your life) can be tricky.

From knowing how much to spend to figuring out what kinds of presents they will genuinely love - and where to buy them - can take the joy out of Christmas shopping.

But if you are stuck for inspiration, look no further than our round up of some of the best gifts covering beauty, tech, homewares and fashion below.

Whether you have cash to burn or need some thrifty but fun options, we have all budgets covered.

And if you need some other festive gifting inspo we have also rounded up the best Christmas gifts for him , best Christmas gifts for grandparents and some great novelty gifts options.

Lush Sparkle Gift Set, £15

Nothing beats a great set of body and bath goodies to enjoy over the festive season. This limited edition set from Lush features a zingy citrus-scented shower gel and Baked Alaska soap made with nourishing cocoa butter and lemon myrtle oil.

Price: £15 - buy now from Lush

Fitbit Charge 3, £110

The latest edition in the Fitbit activity tracker family, the Charge 3 comes with integrated heart rate monitor, sleep tracker as well as technology that syncs up to give you app notifications and access to a personalised dashboard.

There is also the added bonus of seven-day battery life, 50m water resistance and the ability to swap out bands to suit your mood and style.

Price: £110 - buy now from Amazon

Anastasia Beverly Hills Jackie Aina Palette, £46

Beauty fans will love unboxing one of ABH's newest palettes, produced in collaboration with Youtube beauty influencer/blogger extraordinaire Jackie Aina.

The 14 pan eyeshadow palette features a mix of highly pigmented warm-hued glittery and matte shades perfect for creating bold eye looks over the festive party season.

Price: £46 - buy now from Lookfantastic

Frida Floral Art Print, from £16

Know someone who loves filling up their home or bedroom with fun prints? Why not get a print for them to add to their collection? I Am FY has a massive variety of beautiful wall prints for every theme - we happen to love this bright and colourful Frida one, but the options online are endless.

From £16 - buy now from I Am FY

Spa Retreat and Afternoon Tea for Two, £39

(Image: Getty Images)

If you're lucky enough this spa day treat could be the perfect way for you both to relax after the hectic festive season is over. This package

Price: £39 - buy now from Virgin Experience Days

Flower Gem Alice Hair Band, £16

Alice bands are back - in a big way. We love Accessorize's collection, especially this flower gem designed one. Definitely the best way for your loved one to adorn their crowning glory this season.

Price: £16 - buy now from Accessorize

Lucy Williams x Missoma gold mini ridge cross bracelet, £65

Fashion influencer Lucy Williams' latest jewellery collection in collaboration with Missoma is filled with gorgeous must-have pieces.

This stylish bracelet is perfect for anyone who loves accessorising their look with jewellery and the vintage inspired design is a timeless classic that won't date.

Price: £65 - buy now from Missoma

Abuo Pink & Grey Ceramic Plant Pot & Stand Short, £40

Plants are big news for home and interior trends this year, and stylish planters to put them in are even bigger news. Treat your favourite plant lady to one of these super stylish plant pot stands from Oliver Bonas, which come in three different colourways.

Price: £40 - buy now from Oliver Bonas

Bath Bomb Party, £10

This cute bath bomb set features some of The Body Shop's most popular scents - a great stocking filler gift for someone special.

Price: £10 - buy now from The Body Shop

Black Croc Micro Mini Chain Bag, £15

Small bags are bang on trend and this cutesy micro one will score you major brownie points if you're buying for a fashionista this Christmas.

Price: £15 - buy now from Pretty Little Thing

Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Lips Set, £25

Charlotte Tilbury's lipsticks have been lauded as some of the best on the market. Give the gift of her bestselling shade, Pillow Talk, a taupe pink nude that has amassed a cult following since it was launched.

Price: £25 - buy now from Space NK

Instax Link smartphone printer, £109

Let a budding photographer turn their masterpieces into real photos thanks to the Instax portable printer that syncs up with your smartphone.

The printer comes with fun features that let you customise different templates and frames so you can capture and print all those fun moments over the festive season and beyond.

Price: £109 - buy now from Amazon
description: Christmas 2019 is just around the corner, so if you're in search of the perfect gift for the women in your life to open on the big day, read on...
